title: 2023년 In Re Wylmon Boudreaux v. the State of Texas 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: In Re Wylmon Boudreaux v. the State of Texas. 판결일: 2023-05-23. 법원: Court of Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: In Re Wylmon Boudreaux v. the State of Texas
**판결일**: 2023-05-23
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX


## 판결문 요약

Petition for Writ of Mandamus Denied and Memorandum Opinion filed May
23, 2023.




                                     In The

                    Fourteenth Court of Appeals

                               NO. 14-23-00206-CR



                  IN RE WYLMON BOUDREAUX, Relator


                         ORIGINAL PROCEEDING
                           WRIT OF MANDAMUS
                             232nd District Court
                             Harris County, Texas
                         Trial Court Cause No. 738839

                        MEMORANDUM OPINION

      On March 29, 2023, relator Wylmon Boudreaux filed a petition for writ of
mandamus in this court. See Tex. Gov’t Code Ann. § 22.221; see also Tex. R. App.
P. 52. In the petition, relator asks this court to compel the Honorable Josh Hill,
 presiding judge of the 232nd District Court of Harris County, to deliver the judgment
in relator’s conviction for capital murder to the Texas Department of Criminal
Justice (“TDCJ”).

      To be entitled to mandamus relief, a relator must show (1) that the relator has
no adequate remedy at law for obtaining the relief the relator seeks; and (2) what the
relator seeks to compel involves a ministerial act rather than a discretionary act. In
re Powell, 516 S.W.3d 488, 494–95 (Tex. Crim. App. 2017) (orig. proceeding). A
trial court has a ministerial duty to consider and rule on motions properly filed and
pending before it, and mandamus may issue to compel the trial court to act. ...
